A4.text: Cora was rehired as the Red Sox' manager on November 6, 2020.

A5.text: The following day, Cora and the Red Sox mutually agreed to part ways.

A6.text: The Red Sox subsequently hired Alex Cora, signing him to a three-year deal.

A7.text: On January 15, the Red Sox and manager Alex Cora agreed to mutually part ways after he was named in the MLB's report about the Houston Astros sign stealing scandal.

A8.text: The current manager is Alex Cora.
